casebody.data:
Tapfer, Appellee, v. Tapfer, Appellant.

[Cite as Tapfer v. Tapfer (1991), 62 Ohio St.3d 1213.]

(No. 90-1810 Submitted November 6, 1991 Decided December 31, 1991.) Marco & Marco, L.P.C., and Richard J. Marco, for appellee. Zashin, Rich, Sutula & Monastra Co., L.P.A., Robert I. Zashin and Andrew J. Simon, for appellant.

The cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
